xmlText.p: First Period_1, Arizona, Demers 4 (Keller, Stepan), 3:53. 2, Philadelphia, Giroux 17 (Gostisbehere, Voracek), 10:19 (pp). 3, Philadelphia, Raffl 10 (Laughton, Weal), 11:41.
Second Period_4, Arizona, Goligoski 6 (Fischer, Hjalmarsson), 0:24. 5, Philadelphia, Simmonds 19 (Couturier, Gostisbehere), 2:12 (pp).
